name: Monster Truck Madness
description:
Monster Truck Madness is a racing game developed by Terminal Reality. It came out on 01-01-1996. It was published by Microsoft Studios. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play Monster Truck Madness on Game Boy Advance and PC.
It was produced by Mark Randel. It was scored by Kyle Richards and Tom Wedge.
